action.action-desc: Mr. O’Rourke (for himself, Mr. Lamborn, Mr. Grijalva, Mr. Yarmuth, Mr. Russell, Ms. Bordallo, and Mr. Cole) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to modify the criteria for selecting communities to participate in the Small Community Air Service Development Program, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the 21st Century SCASDP Act.

section.header: Small Community Air Service Development Program
section.text: Section 41743(c)(1) of title 49, United States Code, is amended to read as follows:

paragraph.text: On the date of the most recent notice of order soliciting community proposals issued by the Secretary under this section, the airport serving the community or consortium—

subparagraph.text: is not larger than a small hub airport, as determined using the Department of Transportation’s most recent published classification; and

clause.text: has insufficient air carrier service; or
